mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( title, content, category_id, type, user_id ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{categoryId}, #{type}, #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id, b.title, b.content, b.views, b.user_id, b.category_id, c.name AS categoryName, b.created_at, COALESCE(a.name, u.name) AS writer FROM board b LEFT JOIN category c ON c.category_id = b.category_id LEFT JOIN admin a ON b.admin_id = a.account_id LEFT JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.account_id WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
